text: Janny Sikazwe (born 26 May 1979) is a Zambian teacher and also an international football referee. He was one of the referees for the AFCON 2015, and he was the referee at the 2016 FIFA Club World Cup Final in Japan and also at 2017 AFCON final in Gabon. ==References== ==Other websites== *Janny Sikazwe , WorldReferee.com *Profile on RateTheRef.net Category:Living people Category:1979 births
title: Janny Sikazwe
